author: Neuro Assassin
install_msg: This cog is going under development, it is recommended that this is not installed.  It does *work* at the moment, but it may not fully remove extra information from the site you provide.
name: webstatus
short: Tells you whether something is down!
description: This cog tells a Discord User whether a company/website is down, using https://outage.report/ .
